191355.選んだ装備品を 持ちきれません。\n冥海の光玉から取り出す装備品を減らすか\n持:
You can't take out all of the equipment
you've selected. Choose fewer Abyss Orbs or
reorganize your carried equipment.

191356.装備品を ひとつも選んでいません。\n外に出る時に 選ばなかった装備品は \n消:
You haven't selected any equipment. Any
equipment you do not select will disappear.
Proceed?<yesno><close>

191357.選んだ装備品を 冥海の光玉から取り出します。\n外に出る時に 選ばなかった装備品:
You'll take the equipment you've chosen. Any
equipment you did not choose will disappear.
Proceed?<yesno><close>

191360.<color_yellow>\n『解放の扉』の説明です！\n<br>\n解放の扉:
This is an explanation of the "Door of Return"!
The Door of Return is the exit of the ruins that appears when your Abyss Scales run out.
Here, you can select <%dB_LIMIT_NUM> pieces of equipment sealed in the Abyss Orbs you obtained during your exploration and unseal them.
The Abyss Orbs that you do not select, along with the equipment contained within, will be lost when you leave the ruins.
The amount of equipment that you can unseal depends on which floor the Door of Return appeared. A lower floor means more equipment.
Select the equipment you wish to unseal from the Abyss Orbs you've collected, and then choose "Confirm".
If you need to organize your bag first, press the cancel button to exit the menu.

191362.冥海の光玉を 持っていません。: You don't have any Abyss Orbs.

191827.冥海の光玉から\n<%sB_ITEM><%sB_PLUSNUM>を取り出した！\:
Received <%sB_ITEM><%sB_PLUSNUM>
from the Abyss Orb!
<se_nots System 7>
